alert.note: Alert for Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McMullen and southwestern Live Oak Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 644 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Clegg, or 18 miles southwest of George West, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... George West and Simmons. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 628 and 634. US Highway 59 between mile markers 720 and 736. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
